prompts.flatlay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Sleeveless T-Shirt in Sunset Orange, 100% cotton.

COMPOSITION: Follow the line drawing guide for garment placement. IMPORTANT: Maintain realistic sleeveless t-shirt proportions - the width-to-height ratio should match a natural sleeveless t-shirt silhouette.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- SLEEVELESS: This is a sleeveless t-shirt with clean-finished armholes (not cut-off, but designed sleeveless). No sleeves visible.
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets with "RON DORFF PARIS STOCKHOLM" text engraved around them in WHITE/silver. Eyelets in the lower area of the garment near the hem.
- NECKLINE: Classic crew neck/round neckline.
- Ron Dorff label visible at the inside neckline.

STYLING: T-shirt laid perfectly flat with relaxed, natural proportions. Sleeveless armholes clearly visible on both sides. Smooth lightweight cotton fabric texture visible throughout.

COLOR: CRITICAL - Copy the EXACT gradient from the input image. This t-shirt has an OMBRE/DIP-DYE effect: lighter pink-toned orange at the TOP, fading to deeper vibrant orange at the BOTTOM. Match this gradient EXACTLY as shown in the input. Do NOT make it solid orange - preserve the gradient transition.

FABRIC TEXTURE: Smooth 100% cotton t-shirt material. Lightweight, not thick or heavy.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even, diffused illumination. No harsh shadows. Do NOT overexpose or wash out the vibrant Sunset Orange color.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end fashion e-commerce aesthetic. The t-shirt should look relaxed and natural, with clear sleeveless construction.
